snippet.title: Perfect Ninja Painter - First Trailer
snippet.description:
New remaster of the most popular game of our Ninja series. This ninja loves adventure and excitement but he doesn't go anywhere without his paintbrush. Join him while he, literally, paints the town red in this puzzle-platformer game.

Ninjas have never been... painting! Prepare for a fast-paced colorful adventure!

Perfect Ninja Painter is an amusing and colorful arcade game with addicting gameplay. Paint the walls through 50 levels and try to get all the achievements!

Over 100 million times the original Ninja Painter game was played on Flash, the web, and mobiles since 2011, and now it's time to get this great experience in HD.
